text: Nikolai Saltykov () was a Russian actor and director. == Selected filmography == * 1915 — Antichrist * 1915 — Czar Ivan the Terrible * 1923 — Locksmith and Chancellor * 1924 — Story of Seven Who Were Hanged * 1926 — The Bay of Death ==References== == External links == * Николай Салтыков on kino-teatr.ru * Category:Russian male film actors Category:20th-century Russian male actors
title: Nikolai Saltykov (actor)
